alfredsnippet.snippet:
"The century now coming to a close has seen in physics a dazzling expansion of the frontiers of scientific knowledge. ... Often we have felt as did Siegfried after he tasted the dragon's blood, when he found to his surprise that he could understand the language of birds."

- Steven Weinberg, Dreams of a Final Theory, p.1
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - A Dazzling Expansion of the Frontiers of Scientific Knowledge
